title: Satellite image of Hurricane Katrina off the Gulf coast
description: Hurricane Katrina, showing rainfall extremes. The probability of weather events is used as an example in class. (Image courtesy of NASA.)

image_metadata.caption: Hurricane Katrina, showing rainfall extremes. The probability of weather events is used as an example in class. (Image courtesy of [NASA](http://www.nasa.gov/).)
